# Transaction Aggregation API - Copilot Instructions

This project is a production-grade Transaction Aggregation API built with .NET 8, implementing Clean Architecture principles.

## Project Overview
- **Technology Stack**: .NET 8, ASP.NET Core Web API, Entity Framework Core, SQLite/SQL Server
- **Architecture**: Clean Architecture (Domain, Application, Infrastructure, API layers)
- **Features**: Transaction aggregation, categorization, extensive REST APIs
- **Quality**: Production-grade with comprehensive testing, logging, and documentation

## Architecture Layers
- **Domain**: Core business entities and interfaces
- **Application**: Use cases, business logic, DTOs
- **Infrastructure**: Data access, external services, repositories
- **API**: Controllers, middleware, configuration

## Development Guidelines
- Follow SOLID principles
- Implement proper error handling and logging
- Use dependency injection throughout
- Include comprehensive unit and integration tests
- Maintain clean, documented code
- Follow RESTful API design patterns
